feed.title: FlashPaper Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FlashPaper: v2.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump alpine from 3.16.2 to 3.16.3 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/100
  • "autofocus" to textarea added by @sokai in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/101
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/107
  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/105
  • Bump alpine from 3.16.3 to 3.17.1 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/103

New Contributors

  • @sokai made their first contribution in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/101

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2

entry.title: New release for FlashPaper: v2.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump alpine from 3.17.1 to 3.17.2 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/111
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2.2.1 to 2.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/110
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 3.3.0 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/108
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2.4.1 to 2.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/114
  • Add arm dockerfile and update README by @yebo29 in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/99
  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 4.3.0 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/116
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2.5.0 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/125
  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 4.4.0 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/123
  • Bump arm64v8/alpine from 3.17.2 to 3.18.0 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/118
  • Bump alpine from 3.17.2 to 3.18.0 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/117
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 4.0.0 to 4.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/124
  • Bump docker/login-action from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/121
  • Bump arm64v8/alpine from 3.18.0 to 3.18.2 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/126
  • Bump alpine from 3.18.0 to 3.18.2 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/127
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2.7.0 to 2.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/128
  • Build for arm64v8 as well by @AndrewPaglusch in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/144

New Contributors

  • @yebo29 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/compare/v2.2.2...v2.2.3

entry.title: New release for FlashPaper: v2.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fix a bug in v2.2.3 with pre-built images not working on AMD64 - #145

  • Fix multi-arch builds by @AndrewPaglusch in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/146
  • Fix workflow syntax by @AndrewPaglusch in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/147
  • Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/135
  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 4.6.0 to 5.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/137
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2.8.0 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/138
  • Bump docker/login-action from 2.2.0 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/139
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 4.1.1 to 5.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/140
  • Bump alpine from 3.18.2 to 3.19.1 in /docker by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/148

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/compare/v2.2.3...v2.2.4

entry.title: New release for FlashPaper: v2.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed warnings & deprecated issues by @dehlirious in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/151
  • Bump PHP to 8.3 by @AndrewPaglusch in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/153

New Contributors

  • @dehlirious made their first contribution in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/151

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/compare/v2.2.4...v2.3.0

entry.title: New release for FlashPaper: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add highly requested Dark Mode and Logo support by @barry-smithjr in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/159
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 5.0.0 to 5.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/157
  • Bump docker/login-action from 3.0.0 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/160
  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 5.0.0 to 5.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AndrewPaglusch/FlashPaper/compare/v2.3.0...v2.4.0
